oauth.description: OAuth Token for IRC USer (You can get yours here: http://twitchapps.com/tmi/)

optionalName.description: The name of this command. Optional - used mostly for debugging.

twitchRewardId.description: Twitch-generated identifier for your custom channel points reward. You can find your reward ID here: https://www.instafluff.tv/TwitchCustomRewardID/?channel=yourchannel

name.description: The name of this action; optional, for debugging.

messageToWhisper.description: A message to whisper to your bot (if configured). Useful for triggering Streamlabs Chatbot commands.

keysToPress.description:
string to represent hotkeys. Must follow the Java KeyStroke format:
      # See: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/swing/KeyStroke.html#getKeyStroke(java.lang.String)
      # example: shift control alt command A
